entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:16PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAVY RAIN TUESDAY AFTERNOON AND WEDNESDAY... A quick moving but moist atmospheric river will move across the area starting Tuesday and persist into Wednesday evening. Streams and rivers will rise rapidly but at this time are expected to remain within their banks. Rain amounts will range from 1.75 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts possible. The heaviest precipitation
entry.cap:areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area; Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
